What is the name of the HBO animated series that stars Mindy Kaling?
Velma
What character does Mindy Kaling voice in Velma?
Velma Dinkley
Which other TV show did Mindy Kaling create and star in?
The Mindy Project
In The Mindy Project, who is the fellow doctor Mindy falls for?
Danny
Which show did Mindy Kaling create that features an Indian protagonist named Devi Vishwakumar?
Never Have I Ever
What is the name of the character Mindy Kaling plays in The Sex Lives of College Girls?
Bela Malhotra
Which character in Velma is set up to be the romantic interest of Kaling's character?
Fred Jones
What is the name of Mindy Kaling's 2011 memoir?
Is Everyone Hanging Out Without Me?
In what essay does Zeahaa Rehman express discomfort regarding The Mindy Project's depiction of Mindy's racial and cultural background?
A Catapult essay about the legacy of The Mindy Project
Why has the criticism of Mindy Kaling's work become personal vitriol?
Because it's easier to target her as a public figure and people believe her characters' faults are her own
